title: SKPathEffect.CreateDash returns null for odd number of elements in intervals array
body:
Used version: 1.54.0

Wasn't able to reproduce v1.54.1, since samples didn't compile on my box.

Repro:
Change (this line)[https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/blob/v1.54.0/samples/SharedDemo/SkiaSharp.Demos.cs#L1002] and make the intervals[] array have an odd number of elements, like 

`using (var effect = SKPathEffect.CreateDash (new [] { 15f, 5f, 5f }, 0))`

In the above line `effect`will be null.
